Create a stable public API with OpenAPI 3.0 documentation so external developers can integrate without a call.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- OpenAPI 3.0 spec (`openapi.yaml` or `openapi.json`) documents: POST /api/ai/ask, GET /api/ai/verify/:id, GET /api/ai/evidence/:id, GET /api/ai/verifier
- Request/response examples and error codes documented
- "For Developers" page on landing links to spec and provides quickstart (curl/examples)

См. `docs/en/PLAN_PHASE5.md` — 5.1, Tasks P5.1.1, P5.1.2, P5.1.3.
